sqlQuery.name: BooleanExpansion
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga, apidb.geneattributes gb WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND gb.gene_id = ga.gene_id

sqlQuery.name: ToxoGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.* FROM (SELECT source_id, project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$ WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$) c, (SELECT MAX(ga.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ga.organism, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 1, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 2, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 3)) AS source_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism like $$organism$$ GROUP BY ga.gene_id) f WHERE c.source_id = f.source_id

sqlQuery.name: NeosporaGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ga.source_id, ga.project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism = $$organism$$

sqlQuery.name: AllTgResults
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ga.source_id, ga.project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism like $$organism$$

sqlQuery.name: OneToOneToOneTgGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.* FROM (SELECT source_id, project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$ WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$) c, (SELECT MAX(ga.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ga.organism, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 1, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 2, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 3)) AS source_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism like 'Toxoplasma gondii%' GROUP BY ga.gene_id having count(*) = 3) f WHERE c.source_id = f.source_id

sqlQuery.name: StrainInstances
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT $$gene_answer$$.source_id, $$gene_answer$$.project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism = $$strain_a$$

sqlQuery.name: TgStrainGenes
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.* FROM (SELECT source_id, project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$ WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$) c, (SELECT MAX(ga.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ga.organism, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 1, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 2, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 3)) AS source_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism like $$strain_a$$ GROUP BY ga.gene_id) f WHERE c.source_id = f.source_id

sqlQuery.name: DetailsTgStrainIntersect
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT $$gene_answer$$.source_id, $$gene_answer$$.project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, ( SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, ga.organism FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga, apidb.geneattributes gb WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism = $$strain_a$$ AND gb.gene_id = ga.gene_id INTERSECT SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga, apidb.geneattributes gb WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism = $$strain_b$$ AND gb.gene_id = ga.gene_id ) c WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND c.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND c.organism = $$strain_a$$

sqlQuery.name: DetailsTgStrainMinus
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, ( SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga, apidb.geneattributes gb WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism = $$strain_a$$ AND gb.gene_id = ga.gene_id MINUS SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga, apidb.geneattributes gb WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism = $$strain_b$$ AND gb.gene_id = ga.gene_id ) c WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND c.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND c.organism = $$strain_a$$

sqlQuery.name: DetailsTgAllMinus
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT d.* FROM (SELECT MAX(ga.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ga.organism, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 1, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 2, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 3)) AS source_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id GROUP BY ga.gene_id) f, (SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, ( SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga, apidb.geneattributes gb WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND gb.gene_id = ga.gene_id MINUS SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga, apidb.geneattributes gb WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism = $$strain_a$$ AND gb.gene_id = ga.gene_id ) c WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND c.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id) d WHERE d.source_id = f.source_id

sqlQuery.name: DetailsTgAllIntersect
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT d.* FROM (SELECT MAX(ga.source_id) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY DECODE(ga.organism, 'Toxoplasma gondii ME49', 1, 'Toxoplasma gondii GT1', 2, 'Toxoplasma gondii VEG', 3)) AS source_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id GROUP BY ga.gene_id) f, (SELECT c.source_id, c.project_id FROM $$gene_answer$$, ( SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga, apidb.geneattributes gb WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND gb.gene_id = ga.gene_id INTERSECT SELECT gb.source_id, gb.project_id, gb.organism FROM $$gene_answer$$, apidb.geneattributes ga, apidb.geneattributes gb WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND ga.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id AND ga.organism = $$strain_a$$ AND gb.gene_id = ga.gene_id ) c WHERE $$gene_answer.condition$$ AND c.source_id = $$gene_answer$$.source_id) d WHERE d.source_id = f.source_id
